english.p: I'm a Frontend Developer, graduated from UTN Buenos Aires (E-learning Center) as a fullStack developer with ReactJS and NodeJS. I've finished the first year of the Certified Tech Developer career sponsored by MercadoLibre, Globant and Digital House.

academicHistory.carrerDH: Certified Tech Developer sponsored by MercadoLibre and Globant
academicHistory.carrerUtn: Degree in full stack web programming with React JS. Credential ID: CER-VSORA6FT-579548

workExperience.p: In the section Projects you'll find the projects that I've done to date. If you want to see all my projects, please access to my
workExperience.p1IS: Tech stack: React.js · Redux toolkit · Bootstrap · JavaScript.
workExperience.p1HI: Stretching and training classes. Professional in therapeutic groups. Interdisciplinary team.

spanish.p: Soy Desarrollador Frontend, egresado de la UTN Buenos Aires (Centro de E-learning) como desarrollador fullStack con ReactJS y NodeJS. Actualmente estoy terminando el primer año de la carrera Certified Tech Developer patrocinada por MercadoLibre, Globant y Digital House.
